data.title: I Will Fear No Evil: Robert A. Heinlein
data.meta_description: *UNSIGNED*The brilliantly shocking story of the ultimate transplant from New York Times bestselling author and Science Fiction Grand Master Robert A. Heinlein.As startling and provocative as his famous Stranger in a Strange Land, here is Heinlein's awesome tale about a man supremely talented and immensely old, who discovers that the new life he craves comes with a cost. Transplanted into the body of a beautiful young woman, he must forge a new path forward as unexpected challenges reshape his existence into one ultimately more complex.
